actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A joint resolution proposing an amendment to the Constitution of the United States guaranteeing the right of life to the unborn.
subjects: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues

summary.text: Constitutional Amendment - States that with respect to the right to life guaranteed in the U.S. Constitution, every human being subject to the jurisdiction of the United States, or of any State, shall be deemed, from the moment of fertilization, to be a person and entitled to the right to life.

titles.title: A joint resolution proposing an amendment to the Constitution of the United States guaranteeing the right of life to the unborn.
